  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030112</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030112</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Proteínas</string>
            <string language="en">Proteins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Proteine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Protéines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Proteínas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proteine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρωτεϊ'νες</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Se introduce el concepto de péptido y  proteína, explicando el enlace peptídico. Además se describen la estructura y las funciones biológicas de las proteínas.</string>
            <string language="en">An introduction to the concept of peptide and protein, explaining the peptidic link. There is also a description of the structure and biological functions of proteins.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Proteínas</string>
            <string language="en">Proteins</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Einleitung zum Konzept des Peptids und des 
Proteins, das peptidic Link erklärend. Es gibt auch eine 
Beschreibung der Struktur und der biologischen Funktionen der 
Proteine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une introduction au concept du peptide et de la 
protéine, expliquant le lien peptidic. Il y a également une 
description de la structure et des fonctions biologiques des 
protéines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma introdução ao conceito do peptide e da 
proteína, explicando a ligação peptidic. Há também uma 
descrição da estrutura e das funções biológicas das proteínas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'introduzione al concetto del peptide e della 
proteina, spiegante il collegamento peptidic. Ci è egualmente 
una descrizione della struttura e delle funzioni biologiche delle 
proteine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια εισαγωγή στην έννοια του πεπτιδίου και της 
πρωτεϊ'νης, που εξηγεί την πεπτιδική σύνδεση. Υπάρχει 
επίσης μια περιγραφή της δομής και των βιολογικών λειτουργιών των
πρωτεϊνών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Proteine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Protéines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Proteínas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biosfera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proteine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η βιολογία</string>
          </keyword>
